channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC

item.title: Report X-2024070212
item.description:
Report X-2024070212

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-05T18:14:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-19
  • City: WEST COLUMBIA
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED FOR LEAKING HAZMAT ON PD4 AT DOOR 114. WENT TO AREA. RESPONDED TO PACKAGE USING THE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS. EVACUATED THE AREA 15 FEET IN ALL DIRECTIONS. CORDONED OFF EVACUATED AREA. ACTIVATED CHAIN OF COMMAND. NOTIFIED ENVIRONMENTAL COORDINATOR. OUTSIDE RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO CLEAN UP AND CONTAINERIZE SPILL. PAPERWORK WAS COMPLETED WITH OUTSIDE RESPONDER AND DRUMS WERE KEPT ON SITE AND MOVED TO THE DMP CAGE TO AWAIT FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS FOR PROCESSING.
